Yandex Disk.name: G03.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it provides employee training on freedom of expression and information issues?

Yandex Disk.name: G03.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it provides employee training on privacy issues?

Yandex Disk.name: G03.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it maintains an employee whistleblower program through which employees can report concerns related to how the company treats its users’ freedom of expression and information rights?

Yandex Disk.name: G03.04
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it maintains an employee whistleblower program through which employees can report concerns related to how the company treats its users’ privacy rights?
